snippet.title: Shadows Over Loathing - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Shadows Over Loathing is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/shadows-over-loathing-switch/

Explore a sprawling open world chock full of danger, quests, puzzles, and stick figures in this single-player comedy adventure/RPG set in the prohibition era of the West of Loathing universe. See how many enemies you can stuff into a phone booth as the athletic Pig Skinner, control the curds and whey of the cosmos as the cunning Cheese Wizard, or march to the beat of your own inscrutable purposes as the hip Jazz Agent.

#ShadowsOverLoathing #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
